channel.title: Bayesian on rvpanaro
channel.description: Recent content in Bayesian on rvpanaro

item.title: phbp
item.description: phbp project aims to present base risk estimate and related functions based on Proportional Hazards Models using Bernstein Polynomials (BP). For this, a demo was made making use of larynx dataset available at KMSurv Rpackage. Most relevent results were briefly explained and displayed throughout this text. Survival analysis Bernstein polynomials Adaptive rejection metropolis sampling within gibbs sampling Jacobian Method Cox Proportional Hazards (PH) model (partial likelihood) First, we fitted gold standard Cox model.
